title: What happens when a gold beats a diamond 1
body: He lost on his main to me in lane, added me after the game and this is what happened xD, im gold 5 he is diamond 1 and I dont think he can take the loss ;p

replies.body: You beat someone who is meant to be better than you! That makes you trash.

We all know who we're looking at.

**me**

Part of me really wishes you made that name just for moments like this. xD

He mains Fizz and Zed, that's how you get to Diamond without skill, Akali takes skill but the other two don't.
He probs also plays Riven.

your a fking idiot kid, it really pisses people in high elo off when you see scrubs saying stuff like that. i will 1v1 any of you and you get to counter pick me as Zed or Fizz!!!!!

It's true! Her skillfloor is low on paper, however her skillcap is rather high due to how she works, she's the easiest champion in LoL to counter, no one does it though as 100g is to much.
Zed is actually pretty hard to master, same with Fizz (despite popular belief). Akali is pretty binary, though.

Well, Zed's basics are easy, performing the Mind Games is skills.

*Dodging that Riven ult like a  boss*

After all, his main damage output comes from his shadows.
q, hide, e.... uhhh %%%% should have built ad
maybe get to diamond by urself? instead of being a keyboard warrior saying certain champions r op? thats what oceania trash loves to do right?

There are a lot of things wrong with this picture:

1) You can't tell who is saying those things since there's no timestamp and no name. As a result, it could be YOU abusing HIM.
2) When someone deletes you from their friends list, it still says they are online in the message tab you had open with them. Again, this means you could be abusing him after he removed you (and thus wouldn't be getting the message).
3) We have zero context for this except for your word. I doubt a diamond 1 would care this much about losing to a gold player in what I can only assume was a normal. Even if he DID type this abuse, I find it hard to believe it's because you beat him in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=King Thrym,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yjimwKNZ,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-10T17:48:09.495+0000)
>
> There are a lot of things wrong with this picture:
> 
> 1) You can't tell who is saying those things since there's no timestamp and no name. As a result, it could be YOU abusing HIM.
> 2) When someone deletes you from their friends list, it still says they are online in the message tab you had open with them. Again, this means you could be abusing him after he removed you (and thus wouldn't be getting the message).
> 3) We have zero context for this except for your word. I doubt a diamond 1 would care this much about losing to a gold player in what I can only assume was a normal. Even if he DID type this abuse, I find it hard to believe it's because you beat him in lane.

the reason I removed the names is because of the naming and shaming rule, also why would I be abusing a diamond 1 by calling him gold 5, makes sense amirite.

>by calling him gold 5

Someone hasn't seen their own picture, in this picture that isn't said, so his point still stands (and you could have just done that to be credible anyway) not saying their probably isn't diamond's that are mad %%%%s though.

I played with a challenger against someone in platnuim 2, I did absolutely nothing and we won.
when the game was over the kid in platinum kept swearing his ass off about how unfair the matchup was and was bagging the guy in challenger. This was the challenger's response:
"I am sorry, I wont do that again. If you want we can rematch and ill let you win" 

Gives you some kind of perspective eh?

Challengers have got nothing to prove
It isn't about me beating him, it is about his reaction to being beaten by someone lower than him.

you shouldn't even accept the friend request you know whats coming

I beat a diamond Riven when I was silver 3... as well, does that mean I am a diamond riven player? no def not.
it was a Riven vs Riven matchup btw..
Carried by matchmaking

So you're practically bragging?

And if it was norms (probably was) diamonds don't take norms seriously.

I guess some rage got into him, after all, this is OCE.
